project_abstract.cdata: This Provincial Ports Project is designed to strengthen the institutional setup for the management of Ports as well as expand and imProve Port capacity. This would include the expansion of facilities at six Ports and the rehabilitation/maintenance works at six others. Further Provisions for the rehabiliation of ten additional Ports would be selected later. Finally, technical assistance would be required for Project implementation, financial management, training and studies needed for further development of the Port system in the country.
